item.title: Revit Elements to Rhino Using Speckle
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll send some Revit elements to Rhino and the geometry in Rhino will contain selected Revit parameters. This workflow contains a lot of use cases but I will create a really simple script that will color Revit elements by their properties, just to demonstrate the structure of the data that comes from Speckle and how we can use it in the workflow. item.title: Create Revit Sheets from Excel
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll create Revit Sheets from Excel table containing Sheet Names and Numbers with Dynamo. item.title: Floor Finishes by Room using Grasshopper inside Revit
item.description: In this video, we are going to automate floor finish creation using Grasshopper inside Revit. Creating floor finishes is a task that can be automated easily and save us a huge amount of time. When room finishes are defined or embedded in a room’s parameter, it doesn’t make any sense to model floor finishes manually. We are going to create floor finishes from room boundaries using Grasshopper inside Revit.
